content: It isnt against US Law for the Government to print Bibles in any Language. For that matter it isnt proscibed to print Qu'rans, or Torahs. Here is the UCMJ (Uniform Code of Military Justice)http://www.au.af.mil/au/awc/awcgate/ucmj.htm please look in the Punitive Articles (77-134) and point out where there is an Article Proscibing Prostletyzing. There is a Difference between the codified Law and a Command regulation and the failure to follow same. CENTCOM general orders also forbid drinking alcohol,etc. Yet troops in the USA can imbibe off duty. Playboy magazines are sold in PX's everywhere except muslim countries. I can Be charged with having a Fixed Blade Knife over 4" in the USA even in uniform and in Iraq/Stan no one cares. As to the Church, possibly they didnt realize that it could have caused savages looking for excuses to attack our personnel. But to say that that particular Church were willing to have US Service Members die to spread their word is BullSh_t in the extreme.
